segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am quite active and energetic . I approach things enthusiastically and I don't like leaving things half done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am quite outgoing , I think . I enjoy mixing and doing things with others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing for you to be happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I maintain that the most important thing is having good friends . A person can't live alt by himself , I think . A friend in need is a friend indeed . So the more really close friends I have , the better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people do you like to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People who are honest , dedicate to their work and have integrity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people do you find difficult to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Slacker and those who violate working procedures and ignoring deadlines .
segments.speaker: S2
